descriptionList: I am passionate, hardworking, a quick learner used to working in a fast paced environment for long hours.
Strong organisational and leading skills, efficient in meeting productivity targets, offering reliability and responsibility; charismatic and friendly.

moreInfoList: Working in Westminister borough, local authority.
I was supervising teams of 4+ members and working alongside to provide excellent customer service.
I learned how to manage my time more wisely.
Learned a few tips and tricks in the kitchen.

project.projectInfo: Building website in a team to increase efficiency and to deliver better and faster products; actively learning and applying HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Redux

proudList.award: I decided to move in London by myself, leaving everyting that I knew behind and started from scratch.
I started to be interested in programming. I was attracted mostly by the fact that you have tthe possibility to create something from nothing, as a semi-god because my creations will not be living.
I started to learn more about coding and creating a website. I accomplished in 1 month more than I did in 1 year.
